ModMetaData.name: LOS Overlay & Cover Planner
ModMetaData.author: CheaterEater
ModMetaData.description:
Line-of-sight overlay with cover color-coding for pawns, turrets, and planning positions.
[h2]Features[/h2] - Three overlay modes: Off, Static, Leaning (includes lean-around-corner) - Color-coded by cover level: green (clear) to red (heavy cover) - Planning tools: observer markers, hypothetical walls, cover, and openings - Combined coverage view from multiple observers - Works with vanilla RimWorld and Combat Extended
[h2]Compatibility[/h2] - Safe to add mid-save - Compatible with Combat Extended (soft dependency, auto-detected) - No known conflicts
[h2]Credits[/h2] Made by CheaterEater
